flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Switch, DPDT
Tools
  • Phillips 2 Screwdriver
  • Soldering iron
  • Wire cutter/stripper

lines.text: We have a Graco Swing-n-Bouce Infant Swing, dam thing cost over a hundred bucks and no ability to plug it in?!? COME ON! So I installed one.
lines.text_raw: We have a Graco Swing-n-Bouce Infant Swing, dam thing cost over a hundred bucks and no ability to plug it in?!? COME ON! So I installed one.

guide.summary: We love the infant swing for our son, but it EATS batteries. So far, 12 in a month- that's crazy. So I installed an AC adapter so we can plug the swing into the wall outlet.
guide.title: A/C adapter for Infant Swing
